## Read in N discharge data

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

tbl <-
    map_df(
      list.files(path=paste0(here::here(), "/NPDES_discharge"), pattern="*.csv"),
      function(file) read_csv(paste0(here::here(), "/NPDES_discharge/", file))
      )

unique_facilities<-as_tibble(unique(tbl$'NPDES Permit Number'))
nrow(unique_facilities)

write.csv(unique_facilities, "unique ECHO facilities LIS watershed 2007_2020.csv")
write.csv(tbl, "all ECHO data LIS watershed 2007_2020.csv")


```
